purpose: Facilitates secure and autonomous execution of AI-driven tasks within Web3 environments.
principle: Built on a chain-agnostic framework using the Move programming language to ensure secure delegation of on-chain actions.
reusability: Designed as a modular framework with potential for integration into various Web3 applications, supporting multiple blockchain platforms.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited documentation and support for newer blockchain ecosystems.
name: world_ai_protocol
description: A chain-agnostic, secure delegation framework enabling AI Agents to perform autonomous, permissioned on-chain actions across Web3 ecosystems.
highlight: Enables autonomous, permissioned on-chain actions across multiple blockchain ecosystems.
